## Bio

I am Molecular Biologist graduated in Buenos Aires University (UBA), Argentina. 
Currently I work on the [Biomedicine Institute of Buenos Aires](http://ibioba-mpsp-conicet.gov.ar/index.php/en/).

## Education

2019-present: PhD Student, Department of Physiology, Molecular and Cellular Biology, School of Exact and Natural Sciences, University of Buenos Aires. Project title: “Search for new targets of RSUME action in the progression of RCCtype VHL tumors.”. Supervisor: Dr. Prof. Eduardo Arzt. | F

Selection of PhD courses taken (final grade): 
•	Functional Genomics, School of Exact and Natural Sciences, University of Buenos Aires. (10/10).
•	Biological Instrumentation, School of Exact and Natural Sciences, University of Buenos Aires. (9/10).
•	Python programming course. School of Science and Technology, University of San Martín (UNSAM). (9/10). 
•	Advanced Topics in RNA Cell Biology, School of Exact and Natural Sciences, University of Buenos Aires. (10/10). 
2012-2019: Licenciatura (seven-year degree equivalent to Bachelor and Master combined) in Biological Sciences, School of Exact and Natural Sciences, University of Buenos Aires (Final Grade Point Average: 8.72/10). Thesis/Dissertation: “Functional and molecular characterization of the interaction of RSUME and mutants typical of VHL disease and its implications for VEGF overexpression and tumor vascularization” (grade: 10/10). 
Selection of elective courses taken (final grade):  
•	Molecular Biology (10/10) 
•	Genetic Engineering (8/10) 
•	Introduction to Molecular Physiology (10/10) 
•	Biological Chemistry II A (9/10) 
•	Industrial Biotechnology and Applied Microbiology (10/10) 
2007-2011: High School Degree - Carlos Pellegrini High School of Commerce, University of Buenos Aires - Specialization degree in commerce. 

2021-present: Teaching as chief of practical applications, University of Jose C. Paz (paid position). Courses taught: Biostatistics and Demography, Microbiology and Parasitology.
2019-2021: Teaching assistant, Department of Biological Chemistry, School of Exact and Natural Sciences, University of Buenos Aires (paid position obtained through public contest). Courses taught: Introduction to Molecular Bioinformatics, Biological Chemistry. 
2019-2020: Teaching assistant, Department of Physiology and Molecular and Cell Biology, School of Exact and Natural Sciences, University of Buenos Aires (paid position obtained through public contest). Courses taught: Genetics I.
